definition: a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity, corrupt morally or by intemperance or sensuality
details:
noun
- a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity
= synonyms: orgy
verb
- corrupt morally or by intemperance or sensuality
= example: corrupt morally or by intemperance or sensuality
= synonyms: profane, corrupt, pervert, debase, demoralise, demoralize, misdirect, subvert, deprave
